about.title: About Us
about.description: This is the about page in English.

hero.description: Discover the passionate team behind our vision and the values that drive us every day.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Passionate experts who share a common vision: creating exceptional experiences.

member1.name: Alexander Dubois
member1.description: Passionate about innovation and user experience.

member2.name: Sophie Martin
member2.description: Creator of designs that inspire and transform.

member3.name: Thomas Leroy
member3.description: Expert in cutting-edge technologies and software.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: The principles that guide our decisions and shape our company culture.

value1.title: Innovation
value1.description: We constantly push the boundaries of creativity and technology.

value2.title: Quality
value2.description: Every detail matters in our quest for excellence.

value3.title: Collaboration
value3.description: We believe in the power of teamwork and diversity.

value4.title: Impact
value4.description: We create solutions that change the world.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We are committed to creating innovative solutions that transform how people interact with technology. Our goal is to make digital more accessible, intuitive, and human.
mission.point1: Continuous innovation and research for new solutions
mission.point3: Positive impact on society and environment

contact.title: Let's Talk About Your Project
contact.description: Ready to turn your ideas into reality? Contact us to discuss your project.

cta.title: Ready to Start?
cta.description: Join us in this adventure and let's create something extraordinary together.

hero.title: Discover Our Solutions
hero.description: Innovative products designed to transform your business and accelerate your growth.

products.title: Our Products
products.description: Discover our complete range of technological solutions.

product1.name: Mobile Application
product1.description: A revolutionary mobile application that transforms the way you work.

product2.name: Web Platform
product2.description: A complete web platform to manage all your projects in one place.

product3.name: Enterprise Solution
product3.description: A complete solution for large companies with all advanced features.

features.title: Why Choose Us
features.description: Exceptional features that make the difference.

feature1.title: Performance
feature1.description: Exceptional performance for an optimal user experience.

feature2.title: Security
feature2.description: Maximum protection of your data with the latest security technologies.

feature3.title: Scalability
feature3.description: A scalable architecture that adapts to your company's growth.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Business?
cta.description: Join thousands of companies that trust our solutions.
